settings.title: Balanced
settings.text: An entry style level Single Origin coffee with a balanced cup profile. Coffees in this category are typically sweet, round with a low to medium acidity. Easy drinking, all day coffees. Of course, they will have a minimum scoring of 86 points.
settings.custom_html:
<style>
#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > * {
  border: 1px solid #947C5A;
  color: slate;
  cursor: pointer;
  flex-basis: calc(33% - 40px);
 box-shadow: 0 3px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  overflow: hidden;
  position: relative;
  transition: 0.5s ease all;
}

#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > *:before {
background-image: linear-gradient(
  55deg,
  hsl(31deg 54% 53%) 0%,
  hsl(32deg 49% 52%) 13%,
  hsl(32deg 45% 51%) 25%,
  hsl(33deg 40% 50%) 38%,
  hsl(33deg 37% 49%) 50%,
  hsl(34deg 34% 49%) 63%,
  hsl(34deg 31% 48%) 75%,
  hsl(35deg 28% 47%) 88%,
  hsl(35deg 24% 47%) 100%
);
  border-radius: 40px;
  height: 5px;
  content: '';
  left: 20px;
  position: absolute;
  right: 20px;
  top: 52px;
  transition: 0.5s ease all;
}

#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > * p , h3{
  position: relative;
  z-index: 2;
}

#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > * p {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
  margin-top: 1.4rem;
}

#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > *:hover {
  border: 0;
  box-shadow: 0 8px 20px rgba(0,0,0,0.3);
  color: #fff;
  transform: scale(1.05);
  z-index: 2;
}

#Slide-template--16319953862923__9aed932f-1130-4b01-8d78-81c28dfcac7f-1 > *:hover:before {
  border-radius: 4px;
  left: 0;
  height: 100%;
  right: 0;
  top: 0;
}
</style>

settings.title: Terroir
settings.text: Our core strength are coffees with distinct notes of terroir and exciting cup profiles. Single farm partnership coffees offering a taste journey throughout the best coffee regions and some of the most skillful coffee producer on this planet.

settings.title: Exotic
settings.text: This advanced level of processing features more extreme taste profile, surely coming from fermentation and the processing of these super extra-ordinary coffees. You often find boozy, funky or have cinnamon flavours, overrip fruits and an intense dry aroma.
